Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: All moves will deal chip damage on block
Comment: Cannot K.O. with chip damage, chip damage turns into recoverable health gauge

Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Comment: Until Heat Engager reaches the opponent {f-hold} (or {HBHS}), additional chip damage on block

Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Comment: During Heat {HBHS} (or {2+3})

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
What can be done during Heat (unique)
Comment: {b,2,f-hold}, {b,1,1,2,f-hold}, during Libertador {1,2,f-hold}

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
Description: Allows the use of the powered up version of Libertador
Comment: During Libertador {d,3+4}, during Libertador, take high attack from opponent, etc.

Name: Heat Burst
Comment: Partially uses remaining Heat time, {2+3,b,b} to cancel attack

Name: Tifón Patear
Comment: {f,4,4,b-hold} to cancel and face backwards

Name: Aero Press Pegar
Comment: Absorb an attack to power up and deal more chip damage on block

Name: Tacón Plunger
Comment: Chip damage on block

Name: Smell the Coffee
Comment: Or approach crouching opponent during Libertador {d,1+3} (or {d,2+4}), cannot throw escape, unable to shift to Heat Dash

Name: Libertador Revolución
Comment: Or during Heat {3,2,f-hold} or during Heat {ub,b,f-hold}, to shift to Libertador, partially uses remaining Heat time

Name: Double Blend Tempestad > Nuevo Libertador
Description: During Heat {b,1,1,2} on hit or block {f-hold}
Comment: Shift to Libertador, chip damage on block, partially uses remaining Heat time

Name: One Drip Cielo

Name: Puño de Fuego Evitacion
